website_summaries.verdict: Shine your shoes on your way out the door with this stand-up lamb's wool buffer.
pros: Buffs and shines shoes and boots
Detachable dual buffers made of lamb's wool
Buffing pads are long-lasting and durable
Good for extending time between polishes
cons: Shoes look great, but it does not produce the same level of shine as polishing by hand

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: This product is not worth the cost. Customer service was poor when attempting to request replacement of the buffer pads. At first use it was like fur flying everywhere. Now there are bald spots on the buffer pads. When trying to get replacement under warantee Bridget (service@SPT-USA.com) will inappropriately respond to all of your emails with all CAPS (shouting). Don't waste your money on this product.
customer_reviews.author: FRED ZIMMERMAN

customer_reviews.title: Supentown Electric Buffer, Great Product. Makes life a little easier!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this product the other day, have used it a couple of times with great results! Assembly was a snap, I read the instructions. I'm guessing the people that complained about the buffing pads stopping on contact did not read the instructions. This is going to make my shoe maintenance a snap!!! I would buy this product again! I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Neal Baker

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Was pleasantly surprised - this machine is whisper quiet, has plenty of power for its intended purpose, and setup was only tightening the buffers on to the motor and plugging in. Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great little shoe polisher
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased this to keep his officer boots shiny and he loves it. Just flip the switch to turn on and place your foot with boot on up against the polishing pad.
customer_reviews.author: T. Powers

customer_reviews.title: A blast from the past
customer_reviews.text: When I was younger, these were all over the retail landscape. I don't remember when I saw the last one in a store of any kind. Somewhat awkward to use to get the maximum benefit from it, but it's good for a quick touch up.
customer_reviews.author: ThinkmanTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I did good with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my husband and he loves it! He brought it to work to put in his office and now finds his colleagues in his office on the morning polishing their shoes too. Needless to say, I did good with this purchase :)
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Totally questionable picture on packaging.
customer_reviews.text: They have one at work. Shines shoes well. Got one for home. Wife was really confused when she saw the box.
customer_reviews.author: Bink5

customer_reviews.title: Works as described and expected
customer_reviews.text: Overall Happy with purchase, gives a quick clean up on the way out the door. Very convenient. Doesn’t replace a repolish or hand polish but extends the time between polishes.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Mike

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: The motors run stronger that I expected based on other reviews I've read. I am pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: F.J.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product
customer_reviews.text: This product is one that looks from the pictures online that it would do the job. But once you get it the motor is not strong enough and the brushes are very poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Robert K Rice

customer_reviews.title: Poor Woofers!
customer_reviews.text: On the very first use, the red lamb woofer shed chunks of woofer. Will it still work? Probably good enough. I would return it if there wasn't a hassle factor. I'd definitely buy a higher quality one and would not recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: VERY PRACTICAL AND EASY TO USE
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and works fine. I have already two of them.
customer_reviews.author: everhardo

customer_reviews.title: Very nice way to shine your shoes before heading out
customer_reviews.text: I use this product about once or twice a week. I have it placed right by the door, so when I head out I just shine my shoes and off I go. I am very happy with the package and how easy it was to install
customer_reviews.author: Cubanito

customer_reviews.title: Had this for almost a year no problems at all ...
customer_reviews.text: Had this for almost a year no problems at all and paid for itself after 20 shines. I'd suggest getting extra bonnets during purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son-in-law as a gift. He tells me often how much he loves it and the guys in the other office will come in so much to use it that they all now buy the pads to contribute for usage
customer_reviews.author: j. Overman

customer_reviews.title: If you’re on the fence, buy it.
customer_reviews.text: I waffled back and forth on whether this was worth the money before I purchased it. Very glad I did. It is a great tool, simple to use, and very effective. My shoes look great!
customer_reviews.author: gomich14

customer_reviews.title: Nice..
customer_reviews.text: I really like this machine. It is great for shining shoes anytime, but I especially like it when I need a quick buff before rushing to work.
customer_reviews.author: Questforbalance

customer_reviews.title: So far I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: My shoes look amazing every day, I leave it in the downstairs bathroom and my guests love it lol, I use it everyday and my shoes look brand new all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Mark G

customer_reviews.title: but my shoes do look better than anyone I
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for several months now. I am literally the only person I know that owns one of these... but my shoes do look better than anyone I know
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Long

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Works as promised. Does a great job, read the directions. No concerns at all.
customer_reviews.author: RMB

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I use it quite often and have not experienced the problems others have described.
customer_reviews.author: Ejay

customer_reviews.title: 4 years and still going. Great little shoe shiner.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this shoe shiner every day for 4 years and it has been fantastic. I certainly recommend this for a gift, or for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Darron C

customer_reviews.title: Knocks the dust off..
customer_reviews.text: This replaced one I sold 20 years ago.. I'm so happy to have one again...
customer_reviews.author: Rmay702

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work. Doesn’t shine shoes. Do not buy this product!
customer_reviews.author: avidreader

customer_reviews.title: Makes you look sharp
customer_reviews.text: This works great at shining shoes just before you leave the house so you look your best.
customer_reviews.author: George N. Lamont

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This makes the shoe polishing fun. I hate to do it normally and didn't as often as needed. I do now though. Very quiet and strong enough motor to easily get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory A Lagerstam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! quiet and smooth operation, motor seems strong enough.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Lee

customer_reviews.title: Polished Item
customer_reviews.text: Polished was exactly as described and works great. Easy assembly, use it daily for keeping my dress shoes clean!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: sunpentown shoe polisher
customer_reviews.text: It is a great item but the person who received it didn't need it so I need to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Great machine great gift
customer_reviews.text: I have had one for years this was for a friend and every time he sees me or we talk he thanks me. Great machine great gift. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Mike Sassi

customer_reviews.title: Best Value
customer_reviews.text: Saw several others that look exact same at higher price, went for lowest with highest reviews and was not disappointed as the product works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, old fashioned shoe polisher
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Just make sure you don't use polish close to a wall...
customer_reviews.author: Shannon C Welch

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not enough power... Stalls out if you put any pressure on it.
customer_reviews.author: Team Thomas

customer_reviews.title: shoe shiner
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. it's a standup product. It meets my expectations as I knew it would. There is nothing more to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: Charles A.

customer_reviews.title: Shine
customer_reviews.text: The first one came broken and it was a little difficult to get a replacement. However when the replacement came out worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Krysta

customer_reviews.title: Must have for law enforcement officers who like shiny boots
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this shoe polisher. I keep it at work and all the guys are using it! Does a great job bring out your shine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good polisher, worth the investment.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. I had my last one for some 25 years, this one is even better.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Laflamme

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t polish as promised.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t bring leather to a vibrant shine. Probably bought one too cheap.
customer_reviews.author: In search of new ideas

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job
customer_reviews.text: It was east to assemble as the directions were clear (isn't that unusual), I found that it was easy to use.and it did a great job of shining my shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: So far works great! Shines shoes and boots really well!
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works better than expected. My husband uses it daily and loves it. Would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: HDChromeMan

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: A bit hard to get the pads on, but after using the tools and putting them on with some force, it works well.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL R.

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this polisher! !! Works great. Perfect for keeping my shoes looking their best.
customer_reviews.author: Delanecpa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy.
customer_reviews.text: Should have bought one of these a long time ago!!! Excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter

customer_reviews.title: Don't leave home without using it
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it is to shine my shoes every day whether it's a shine or just a buff
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Shiny shoes!
customer_reviews.text: This polisher does exactly what it says it will. I would recommend it to a friend. I keep it in the bathroom of our office and everybody loves it. You still must polish your shoes but for that daily quick shine this does the trick.
customer_reviews.author: STL Ace

customer_reviews.title: Weak motor
customer_reviews.text: Motor needs to be stronger. The buffers stop spinning if I press my shoe to hard
customer_reviews.author: Brewster Beattie

customer_reviews.title: buffer for shoes
customer_reviews.text: serves the purpose admirably as it will give a fine finish buff. it is not for obtaining a complete polish job. that takes elbow grease and time. but for freshening the polish on your shoes its perfectly fine.
customer_reviews.author: joseph a catania jr

customer_reviews.title: Black Buffer Pad fell apart
customer_reviews.text: The Black buffing pad fell apart after using 3 times -
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I have twins that are 9 months old, so I don't have the time to shoeshine my shoes by hand. This makes my shoes look great before heading to work.
customer_reviews.author: spndzl

customer_reviews.title: do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: so very cheaply made. tried to use but no luck. a total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected.  Used In a busy office
customer_reviews.text: Men and women, we all use it. Nice for touching up your shoes between shines. As rr tt gg hhh
customer_reviews.author: W. Manley

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT FOR HUBBY!
customer_reviews.text: My husband use it every single day. I'm glad I got this buffer!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived safely and on time, looking forward to many shines to come !
customer_reviews.author: emanuel johnson

customer_reviews.title: Buffer is OK for light use
customer_reviews.text: The buffer is OK but a little difficult to put the pads on. Also the motor is a little weak.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: KKEEPS MY SHOES LOOKING GOOD. ALSO WORKS WITH MY BOOTS.
customer_reviews.author: Martin J. Rapoport

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRACTICAL PRODUCT AND GOOD VALUE
customer_reviews.text: EASY TO EXTRACT FROM THE BOX AND SET UP; SOLID BRUSH CONNECTION AND IT WORKS VERY WELL. I WOULD BUY IT AGAIN.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond D. Lucas

customer_reviews.title: GRATEFUL
customer_reviews.text: MY SONS WERE THRILLED TO RECEIVE THESE BUFFERS AS THEIR GRANDFATHER OWNED ONE AND AS WELL AS BEING USEFUL IT BROUGHT BACK MEMORIES OF A MUCH LOVED MAN!!
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda McCormick

customer_reviews.title: he really like it and he using the buffer
customer_reviews.text: Brought it for my husband, he really like it and he using the buffer! :-0
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Saves time, not money!
customer_reviews.text: The drive which led to this purchase was dress shoes that needed to be shined. For all intents and purposes this device works great. I apply a little bit of shoe shine wax to the shoe, let it dry and then use this device to buff it out. The brushes are very soft, and the motor is strong enough for dress shoes. The motor stops infrequently only when too much force is applied to the brush. I only wish this device were cheaper, but because I am grading based on application, five stars all the way.
customer_reviews.author: J. Yoon

customer_reviews.title: ... used a mid-size police agency and is working out great. Hundreds of boots a month use this device ...
customer_reviews.text: This dual buffer is being used a mid-size police agency and is working out great. Hundreds of boots a month use this device and there have been no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie  Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: He uses it to shine his shoes and he loves it
customer_reviews.author: jean kolinski

customer_reviews.title: Shoe polisher
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Rollers are positioned at a good height. My husband's shoes look new every morning which makes him look even more professional. Would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: M. Beck

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Simple enough to use and operate. Gets the job done.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great choice. Bought it for my husband & he loves it. Excellent service from Amazon.

customer_reviews.title: Shoe polisher/buffer
customer_reviews.text: My husband has the same one in his office and he loves it

customer_reviews.title: This is great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this as I can polish shoes in no time. I have set this in my office and many coworkers come by to use it. What a great idea.
customer_reviews.author: Megan F. Nordlander

customer_reviews.title: Super Product!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband as a Christmas gift and we love it. So much that we are getting another one for our other house overseas!
customer_reviews.author: Luz Maria Sampedro

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. As seen at international hotels. Going to church, stop at the shoe polisher first. I just love it!

customer_reviews.title: Just wgat I wanted, and GOT!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. And received. Everyone should have one. Lots of use and I enjoy it. Merry Christ mas

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my shoes shining
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly as advertised. I bought one for my office and one for my home. I use it primarily to buff my shoes before I leave for the office and when I leave the office to go to Court and it does a great job of making my shoes look freshly shined. I also use it instead of a brush to buff my shoes when I polish them.
customer_reviews.author: John Cliff

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product, I have used it several times and it works well
customer_reviews.author: Andrew P.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect gift for my boyfriend. We set it up I our walk in closet and with a quick push of the button his shoes are buffed as he leaves for work
customer_reviews.author: SaavyShopper

customer_reviews.title: The Husband likes it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for Christmas after he mentioned that he would like to have a shoe polisher. He has been using it since then and he likes it. Yesterday he even showed me how nice and shiny they looked. (So unlike him to even mention something like this) He even mentioned that water was beading up on them.
customer_reviews.author: ME

customer_reviews.title: gift
customer_reviews.text: arrived on time, was what I wanted, but was given as a gift so I do not know about performance
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Gets the Job Done
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad for Christmas. He loves it-uses it every morning. I was worried the motor wouldn't be powerful enough based on other reviews I looked at before I bought it, but just wasn't willing to shell out $250.00 or more for a top of the line model. My dad uses it daily and hasn't run into any problems yet.
customer_reviews.author: MatteoChiave

customer_reviews.title: the buffer
customer_reviews.text: The buffer is nice it doesn't take up much room. I like the power of the machine it is worth the money I spent.
customer_reviews.author: James Holland

customer_reviews.title: This is amazing. Two seconds and i am out the door ...
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing. Two seconds and i am out the door with shiny shoes. Recommended. Arrived as expected and works better than expected.

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: Works Great! Love it! Plenty of power and rpm does not slow when using it! Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Shoe buffer
customer_reviews.text: Great item, works fine, I use it every day. Just like in upscale hotels.

customer_reviews.text: Buffer works well. Motor is strong and does not slow down during buffing.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this for a couple years now and it is still operating perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Adequate
customer_reviews.text: This is an adequate unit. Tightening the brushes is a bit of an issue. Otherwise it is serviceable.

customer_reviews.title: Gets used a lot
customer_reviews.text: Love this machine! I bought it for my staff and keep it in front of the time clock and it gets a lot of use. I recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Solid! As good as any I've used in a hotel or restaurant.

customer_reviews.title: Good buffer
customer_reviews.text: Gets used frequently at our work by many sales people. It is quiet and does a nice job. No complaints

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband was thrilled to get this shoe polisher. He uses it everyday and thinks that everyone should have one.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K Ryder

customer_reviews.title: Really not the quality I was used to in shoe ...
customer_reviews.text: Really not the quality I was used to in shoe shine buffers butwoul require more time and effort than it is worth to package it and return it. A classic case of caveat emptor.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Truluck

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my son and it works well. Just ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son and it works well. Just touch the shoe to the buffer not too hard but it does shine the shoe up.
customer_reviews.author: D. Tipton

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price point
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day and it seems to work great. It is not a super high end shoe buffer, but I also wasn't looking to spend that kind of money. The motor has plenty of power and the buffing pads are holding up well. I would buy again; however, doubt I'll need to as it seems like it will last a while
customer_reviews.author: cwa

customer_reviews.title: The Best Thing for Quick Touchup
customer_reviews.text: I have used one of these at work for 15 years. It works great to touch up my boots when they get a little scuffed or dirty. I bought one for the house after the one at work finally stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bond

customer_reviews.title: Easy, convenient, and works great
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it! He uses it often. It does a great job polishing shoes. It's fast and convenient. There was a slight problem when we first got it. One of the buffers wouldn't screw on. I guess the threads didn't line up or something. The seller was quick to exchange the part and then it worked great. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: M. de Jongh

customer_reviews.title: make sure you take care of them with good lotions and make you job easier with this electric ...
customer_reviews.text: I wear dress shoes six days a week and I kick myself with them when I realize I could have bought this years ago. I purchased two pairs of Allen Edmonds and they get buffed to perfection with frequency. I usually place the buffer on an ironing board and put my hand into the shoe to give myself more control and the results are satisfying. If you wear dress shoes with frequency, make sure you take care of them with good lotions and make you job easier with this electric buffer.
customer_reviews.author: Tucker Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The buffer is ok, wasn't as powerful as I had hoped. Maybe its the buffer heads that are too soft? In any case, you will still need to do some hand polishing if you want super shiny as this machine will not produce that kind of shine. I think I will end up using it to clean the dust off my shoes and apply a light buff. There's nothing like elbow grease I guess.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon24

customer_reviews.title: More novel than practical
customer_reviews.text: This is about the equivalent of wiping your shoes with a mink oil sponge. It will give a nice finish, but only if you’ve already put the manual work in. Hard to get at spots other than the toe if you’re wearing the shoes, which is how this was designed to be used. But it is not useless and it is a cool thing to have if you’re that type of guy.
customer_reviews.author: Urban, C.

customer_reviews.title: Use it every day.
customer_reviews.text: Use this every day. Great quality with no problems. What's up with the picture on the box though?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a friend who is into fashion and he loved it! I've seen these before at our country club and know that they work fairly well to build up a shine when you already have wax on the shoe and just need to buff it. It's great for in between polishes.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Good Product - Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: Works well, it does its job every morning and my shoes look great, good value for the money. I will update on wear and tear later, but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Don (Fat Cat) Tigre

customer_reviews.title: One of the best items you can buy for an office
customer_reviews.text: One of the best items you can buy for an office. We have 10 people using it daily and it has worked for over a year. Also, these people are really good a breaking stuff. I would highly reccomend it.
customer_reviews.author: h2_200161813

customer_reviews.title: Solid construction and has operated like a champ
customer_reviews.text: The product worked as described. Solid construction and has operated like a champ. If I had to complain I would say the brush wears too quickly. I can see that after only a couple of uses the fluff grows flat. Otherwise it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer

product_meta.title: Sunpentown UC-989 Dual-Buffer Shoe Polisher w/Lamb Wool buffers
product_meta.description:
Buff and shine your shoes professionally, but without the high cost and wait. Suitable for all types of shoes, quickly and easily. Dual buffers made of 100% lamb wool.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here [PDF ] 
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Product Dimensions :9 x 33 x 30 inches; 7 Pounds
 * Item model number :UC-989
 * Date First Available :July 26, 2005
 * Manufacturer :Sunpentown
 * ASIN :B001BPY9QE

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars358 ratings Buff and shine your shoes professionally, but without the high cost and wait. Suitable for all types of shoes, quickly and easily. Dual buffers made of 100% lamb wool.
feature_bullets: Suitable for all types of shoes, quickly and easily
Dual buffers for a perfect polish
One touch - easy control ON/OFF switch
